meanings.meaning: pledge one's word[honor, life, faith] to

vlive.korean: 아 마지막 목숨...! The last life...! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 짜잘생긴 떠브유떠브유에이치 석진아 생일 축하해 전말전말!!!💜⁺◟(●˙▾˙●)◞⁺💜🎉 (HAPPY JIN DAY!)
마지막 목숨이야 진짜 - 한 번만! The last life. - Just once! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 짜잘생긴 떠브유떠브유에이치 석진아 생일 축하해 전말전말!!!💜⁺◟(●˙▾˙●)◞⁺💜🎉 (HAPPY JIN DAY!)
안 돼요! - 줄게! 내 목숨 값! No. - I'll give it to you! The price of my life! 듣기 View video 렛스튜디오 (LETstudio) : [목숨값] Ep09 나 때문에 싸우는 두 남자
vlive.english: No. - I'll give it to you! The price of my life!

vlive.korean: [브이픽은요... 새해 목표 목숨 유지야...] 지민이는요~ [V PICK's resolution is to stay alive...] Jimin is~ 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 2020 덕담 트렌드는 인과응보 스타일, 복 받으려면 잘하자~!💜ヽ(･∀･)ﾉ💜 (BTS’s New Year Countdown)
vlive.english: [V PICK's resolution is to stay alive...] Jimin is~

vlive.korean: [오늘도 목숨 내놓고 말하는 뱀루살이] 형 파이팅! [BAMBAM is putting his life on the line again] Fighting! 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.18
vlive.english: [BAMBAM is putting his life on the line again] Fighting!

examples.korean: He risked his life to save her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그녀를 구하기 위해 자기 목숨을 걸었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He risked his life to save her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Jack Frost was threatening to kill the new plants. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 서리가 새로 심은 화초들의 목숨을 위협하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Jack Frost was threatening to kill the new plants. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ten fishermen were saved in a daring sea rescue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 과감한 해상 구조 작업으로 열 명의 어부가 목숨을 건졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ten fishermen were saved in a daring sea rescue. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Whales are still being hunted and killed in the Arctic. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 북극에서는 아직도 고래들이 사냥을 당해 목숨을 잃는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whales are still being hunted and killed in the Arctic. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Thousands suffered death or mutilation in the bomb blast. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 폭발 사고로 수천 명이 목숨을 잃거나 불구가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Thousands suffered death or mutilation in the bomb blast. Add to Wordbook
